item.title: George Christodoulou
item.description: Georgios (George) Christodoulou I received my diploma in Computer Science and Engineering from the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina in 2017. I received my MSc in Computer Science with specialization in software from the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina in 2020. My research interests include Data Management and Query processing (Efficient Data Indexing and Retrieval on temporal data). Currently, I am pursuing my PhD degree from the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina, supervised by Prof.
